context: Can you recommend some Ara Celi movies?
Sure! Ara Celi starred in American Beauty, a drama film directed by Sam Mendes. Have you seen it?
I saw it a long time ago, but I mostly forgot it. Who else is in American Beauty?
Great actors such as Alan Ball, Scott Bakula, and Peter Gallagher are in the movie.
Perhaps I should rewatch it. It is sort of existential as well, right?
resp: Yes. If you like that genre, I also recommend you see Ordinary People written by Judith Guest.
